name: Down the well und up again
name_original: Down the well und up again
description:
This is my submission to the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1. Down the well und up again is about a brave little Knight who one day decided to jump down the well out of curiosity. Now you got to help him get back up again! 

My original goal was to generate the levels each time you play. For that I tried out an implementation of the Wave Function Collapse algorithm. But generating playable levels proved difficult especially with such a short time window. What's in the game is one of the generated level structures but heavily modified to look better and be actually playable.

I hope you have fun trying it out. I did an all nighter to actually have some gameplay ;)
